amendment.description: To make permanent the authority to provide travel and transportation allowances for dependents to visit hospitalized members injured in combat operation or combat zone with funding provided out of existing funds through a reduction in nonessential civilian travel.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1367 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1367 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Feingold.
